redirect.py¶

GET /redirect/<scope>/<name>/?$¶
Redirect download

Example request:

GET /redirect/<scope>/<name>/?$ HTTP/1.1

Example response:

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Vary: Accept
Content-Type:
Status Codes:
  • 500 Internal Server Error – e.__class__.__name__: e.args[0][0]
